documentation.text:
@notice The (older) MamaPut contract gives out a constant number of JOLLOF tokens per block.
 It is the only address with minting rights for JOLLOF.
 The idea for this MamaPut V2 (MCV2) contract is therefore to be the owner of a dummy token
 that is deposited into the MamaPut V1 (MCV1) contract.
 The allocation point for this pool on MCV1 is the total allocation point for all pools that receive double incentives.
@notice Address of MCV1 contract.
@notice Address of JOLLOF contract.
@notice The index of MCV2 master pool in MCV1.
@notice Info of each MCV2 pool.
@notice Address of the LP token for each MCV2 pool.
@notice Address of each `IRewarder` contract in MCV2.
@notice Info of each user that stakes LP tokens.
@dev Total allocation points. Must be the sum of all allocation points in all pools.

typeDescriptions.typeString: struct MamaPutV2.PoolInfo storage ref[] storage ref

documentation.text: @notice Returns the number of MCV2 pools.

typeDescriptions.typeString: struct MamaPutV2.PoolInfo storage ref[] storage ref
struct MamaPutV2.PoolInfo storage ref[] storage ref
struct MamaPutV2.PoolInfo storage ref[] storage ref

documentation.text:
@notice Set the `migrator` contract. Can only be called by the owner.
 @param _migrator The contract address to set.

@notice Migrate LP token to another LP contract through the `migrator` contract.
 @param _pid The index of the pool. See `poolInfo`.

typeDescriptions.typeString: struct MamaPutV2.PoolInfo storage ref[] storage ref
mapping(uint256 => mapping(address => struct MamaPutV2.UserInfo storage ref))

documentation.text:
@notice Update reward variables for all pools. Be careful of gas spending!
 @param pids Pool IDs of all to be updated. Make sure to update all active pools.

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (uint256) view external returns (struct IMamaPut.PoolInfo memory)

documentation.text: @notice Calculates and returns the `amount` of JOLLOF per block.

typeDescriptions.typeString: struct MamaPutV2.PoolInfo storage ref[] storage ref
struct MamaPutV2.PoolInfo storage ref[] storage ref
mapping(uint256 => mapping(address => struct MamaPutV2.UserInfo storage ref))
mapping(uint256 => mapping(address => struct MamaPutV2.UserInfo storage ref))
mapping(uint256 => mapping(address => struct MamaPutV2.UserInfo storage ref))
mapping(uint256 => mapping(address => struct MamaPutV2.UserInfo storage ref))

documentation.text: @notice Harvests Jollof from `MASTER_CHEF` MCV1 and pool `MASTER_PID` to this MCV2 contract.

typeDescriptions.typeString: mapping(uint256 => mapping(address => struct MamaPutV2.UserInfo storage ref))
